amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 118-4 to state that nothing in this bill should be construed to suggest that the task of combating inflation and bringing down the cost of living is the sole responibility of the Executive Office of the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 56 (Roll no. 129).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Lee (NV).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 364 - 56 (Roll no. 129).
